# ggnomics <img src="man/figures/logo_300px.png" align = "right" width = "150" />

This packages offers tools to integrate Bioconductor S4 classes and the ggplot2 plotting system. 

## Installation

You can install this experimental branch from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("teunbrand/ggnomics")
```
